verses.roman:
yāṅra dvārā kaila prabhu kīrtana pracāra
yāṅra dvārā kaija prabhu jagat nistāra

synonyms: yāṅra dvārā—by whom; kaila—did; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kīrtana pracāra—spreading of the saṅkīrtana movement; yāṅra dvārā—by whom; kaila—did; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jagat nistāra—deliverance of the entire world.
translation: It is through Him [Advaita Ācārya] that Lord Caitanya spread the saṅkīrtana movement and through Him that He delivered the world.
